title: Molecular Biology Teacher Training: Integrated Online-Offline Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic high school life science knowledge and understanding of laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Part of a molecular biology bootcamp for Hawaii high school biology teachers: Blended learning environment combining online modules with laboratory practicums

learning_goals: Key molecular biology techniques such as PCR and gel electrophoresis can be simulated online to explain experimental principles
Online modules can be utilized to present safety protocols and error-resolution strategies required in experimental design
Project-based assessments can develop molecular biology laboratory guidelines applicable to student research mentoring

resources: Molecular Biology Lab Equipment (Micropipettes, Centrifuges, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
